urls.title: Webinars | Ecosystems Knowledge Network
urls.description: The Ecosystems Knowledge Network runs webinars to share good practice, new tools and resources around the UK. These are one of our most popular services, serving many who otherwise could not access this type of learning opportunity due to budget or travel restrictions. We have the experience of running over 75 webinars. For recordings of selected events that have already taken place, see our webinar library. Every month of the year we run free webinars featuring tools and projects from around the UK.
